TITLE: Provides for real property credit and special excess automotive fuel amount assistance fund for the low income home energy assistance program
Requires persons under eighteen to maintain good attendance at school to be eligible for a learner's permit or driver's license unless exempt
Provides that one of every one hundred metered parking spaces in the city of New York shall be designated as a handicapped parking space
Provides that no person seven years of age or over shall be a passenger in the back seat of a motor vehicle unless such person is restrained by a safety belt
Provides that photo images of a licensee contained on a renewal license shall be filed for no more than one year from the date of renewal
